column2: Summon Familiar

As a practitioner of magic, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can summon a familiar of [From.GetHerHis] choice. This supernatural guardian will grant §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! its powers by increasing [From.GetHerHis] attributes.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait to Summon a Familiar, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
Bodily Enslavement

As a practitioner of magic, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can cast a spell to enslave any courtier in [From.GetHerHis] own realm who has negative opinion of [From.GetHerHim]. This will make them a branded slave and a whore.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a courtier's portrait to attempt to enslave them, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Works only on courtiers in the same realm.
Heart Enslavement

As a practitioner of magic, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can cast a spell to enslave the mind of any courtier or vassal in [From.GetHerHis] own realm who has positive opinion of [From.GetHerHim]. This will make them a lover... and potentially a parent.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a courtier's portrait to attempt to enslave their mind, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Works only on courtiers and vassals in the same realm.
Fireball

As a practitioner of magic, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can cast a spell to incinerate any courtier in [From.GetHerHis] own realm who has negative opinion of [From.GetHerHim] or is a rival. This will fry them to a crisp, but the aiming is a bit off.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a courtier's portrait to attempt to incinerate them, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Works only on courtiers in the same realm.
Flamestrike

As a practitioner of magic, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can cast a spell to incinerate any independent ruler's holder. This will destroy a random building in their demesne, but the aiming is a bit off.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a ruler's portrait to attempt to incinerate their holding, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Works only on independent rulers.
Buy a Spellbook

Every good mage needs a book of spells. Without a spellbook, you will be unable to cast any spells. Thankfully, your society has a wide variety of them to sell. The fancier the book, the better spells it can hold.
Enables the buying of a spellbook, the required item needed to cast the various spells learned from the society.
Acquire Ingredients
Your apprentice will accompany you on a trip to gather rare ingredients for your alchemical inventory.
column3: Votre apprenti vous accompagnera en voyage pour rassembler des ingr?dients rares destin?s ? votre stock alchimique.
column4: Euer Lehrling wird Euch bei einer Reise begleiten, um seltene Zutaten f?r Euer alchemistisches Inventar zu sammeln.
column6: Tu aprendiz te acompa?ar? en un viaje para reunir ingredientes poco comunes para tu inventario alqu?mico.

column2: Enables a decision in the Intrigue menu to allow you and your apprentice to gather rare reagents for spells.
Spell of Bodily Enslavement
You add the ingredients to the cauldron and focus on your target while chanting the magic words...
Let the chains bind!
The spell succeeds!
The spell backfires!
Spell of Heart Enslavement
You add the ingredients to the cauldron and focus on your target while chanting the magic words...
Let [spell_target.GetHerHis] heart be mine!
The spell succeeds!
The spell works only for tonight.
Spell of Fireball
You add the ingredients to the cauldron and focus on your target while chanting the magic words...
Let [spell_target.GetHerHis] body burn!
The spell misses the target.
The spell misses the target, but hits someone else...
The spell hits the target!
Spell of Flamestrike
You add the ingredients to the cauldron and focus on your target while chanting the magic words...
Let [spell_target.GetHerHis] domain burn!
The spell misses the target.
The spell burns down a building!
Shopping

The society library has quite a few blank spellbooks for sale. Some are more expensive than others.

Basic spellbook - 75 gold
Ornate spellbook - 150 gold
Opulent spellbook - 300 gold
This plain book is sufficient.
This ornate book will suit me nicely.
This opulent book is worth the price!
Buy a basic spellbook. This will hold only the most basic of spells.
Buy an ornate spellbook. This will hold grander spells.
Buy an opulent spellbook. This will hold any spell you desire.
Nevermind
Basic Spellbook
Owner of a small book of spells.
Ornate Spellbook
Owner of a large book of spells.
Opulent Spellbook
Owner of an enchanted book of spells.
Write an Arcane Theory Discovery.\n
Transcend the understanding of the Arcane by crafting a discovery tome of Arcane Theory.\n
Enables a decision from the Intrigue menu to write your finest work.
Choose Mage Focus
Further your arcane training by picking a school of specialization.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a your portrait to choose your arcane specialization, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
Spousal Enslavement
You add the ingredients to the cauldron and focus on your target while chanting the magic words...
Let [spell_target.GetHerHim] falsely trust me!
The spell fails.
The spell succeeds!
Spousal Enslavement
As a practitioner of magic, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can cast a spell to make a spouse falsely trust them.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on a spouses's portrait to attempt to make them more trusting, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Works only on spouses in the same realm.
